attributes.action: Allow higher tax allowance thresholds for working pensioners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pensioners sometimes have no choice but to work to combat low state pensions and supplementary small company pensions.  Many undertake jobs attracting the minimum wage and, for example, on an average monthly wage of  £500 for 20 hrs work per week, pay 22% in tax, soon to be increased due the abolishment of the 10% tax band
